name: Consultant 2-3, Tax Compliance Nur-Sultan/Almaty
description:
Working on site with the client, we support them in setting their compliance goals and tax risk management strategy. We always talk through their tax returns so that they can feel totally comfortable that any position taken is consistent with wider tax strategy objectives.

Responsibilities:

  • Preparing client deliverables, including written advice and reports, tax calculations, personal income tax returns and conduction of tax counseling sessions;
  • Preparing contracts and other project-related documentation, proposals, presentations, marketing materials and tax checklists;
  • Developing and maintaining strong professional relationships with clients;
  • Regularly updating information on market opportunities and identifying potential areas for additional work.

Requirements:

  • Higher education (degree preferably in economics, finance, accounting, mathematics);
  • At least 2-3 years of experience as an accountant gained in reputable Kazakhstan or international companies or similar experience in Big4;
  • Excellent knowledge of Kazakh tax and accounting legislation;
  • Relevant Kazakh or international qualification is a plus;
  • Advanced computer skills (MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint).
